attributes.action: Stop companies from overseas, buying up UK companies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Other Countries do it. So why not ours?
Bring in a law, or step in and stop overseas companies from buying up this countries large companies. This will safeguard UK jobs and stop other countries from taking control of our future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
